roleset.name: having obscurred visibility (like or from the weather condition)

role.descr: entity or location that is hazy

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT.

example.name: less empty arg1
example.text: The air is hazy in Boulder today.

example.name: both args
example.text: I have to confess the details are hazy to me, but it's all in our brochure.

example.name: both args, different syntax
example.text: I'm hazy on the details but there was an amazing one involving TJ Maxx. something about a mirror.
